https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1pyPSbSVp7YcCu3Gne7LOSrtsZQ.jpg There is no place for doubt, sadness and fear in the American army. Still, many soldiers struggle with these feelings. Beer is Cheaper than Therapy portrays what goes on behind the facade of heroism and the 'John Wayne mentality'. Beer Is Cheaper Than Therapy
